title: Mediafire Help....

replies.body:
IMO dropbox is better.

Just search download dropbox (WIndows or Mac or Linux)

Then the download should start on its own and when it does it will be a dropbox installer and it will give you the steps there!

replies.body:
Hit Upload, then drag and drop, then hit upload again..

FOR MAC:

Hit Add file, then drag and drop, then hit upload...

FOR LINUX:

Hit Upload, then drag and drop, then hit upload again..
